title: How to write a letter to the college principal for the absence of past examination - Quora

response.answer_text: To The principal, Annie besant college, Dilsukshnagar, Hyderabad, Respected madam, As IAM p.sravani from bipc 1st year studying in your college.I have not attended to the college sence (13–07–19 to 31–07–19) because of health issue has I was admitted in hospital . please forgive me to attend for farther classes. Thanking you, Yours sincerely, P.sravani, Bipc 1st year.

It's best, before you even sit down to write, to do this first: find a photograph of a Chief Petty Officer, and on a Tuesday night, between 9:03pm - 10:19pm burn the photograph outside in a concrete urn. As the smoke is rising, recite this chant 3 times: “Oh for want of land and sea gaze upon the one for me naval run by moonlight cast drown the cyrene, pore and blast”
